reviews.review: I was an adventurer like you, until I started playing this game

It's Counter Strike, what am I supposed to say? Shooting will never be as much fun as in 1.6 but GO does have a lot of good features including matchmaking and updates, bringing balancing and new maps or game modes at times

Very good game have not played this in a long time. But i am getting back into it and enjoy every min of it !!
jogo muito bom para passar raiva, dar aquele rage que vc guardou o dia inteiro. muitos xiters, boludos e todinhos para estragar o seu jogo. fora isso top demais.
